name: @greghearn/correlation-keys-middyware
description: Middy middleware module used in conjunction with @greghearn/correlation-keys for parsing header fields

scripts.npm-publish-patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.npm-publish-minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.npm-publish-major: npm version major && npm publish --access public

author: Greg Hearn
